title: 地球🌏上的居民会听见宇宙🌌的弦乐吗？
content:
“Panta Rhei”, Play it Cool.
“萬物，以冷為測度，以流為分形”
“与是这个宇宙中最多的元素，也是最轻的物质。在天空中，它们组成了我们仰望的繁星，在地球上，它们组成了我们追逐的科学，在寂静中流动，在深冷中燃烧。绝对零度，不代表没有温度的情感，也不是梦想的极限。愿一窥万物冻结之处，愿一闻无声的流淌，愿终其一生去探寻属于低温的浪漫主义与实用论。”
MyselfEducation
2022-2026 BE. Zhejiang University, Cryogenic Engineering (Chu KoChen Honor College)
2026-? PhD. Peking University, Fluid Dynamics

Research
Superfluid Helium
Quantum Turbulence
AI/QC for Fluid
Fluid Stability

Something to be LeftGreat Physicist Feynman and Landau once dived into Superfluid Helium, So I follow them.

  
    
      ❄

    
    
      
“I can live with doubt, and uncertainty, and not knowing. I think it is much more interesting to live not knowing than have answers which might be wrong.”——Richard Philip Feynman

    
  


  
    
      🌌

    
    
      
“Cosmologists are often in error but never in doubt.”——Lev Davidovich Landau
